description: This course is designed for teachers who are tasked with the responsibility of teaching students in brick and mortar classrooms. This course contains an inventory of games and activities that you can use without technology, and thus use anywhere in the world. You don't have to go through this course linearly! Pick and choose the courses that you'd like to watch for more information and inspiration on the types of activities that you can use in the classroom when you are without technology.
title: Teaching without Technology
